Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermNotesPayable.label: Notes Payable, Noncurrent
LongTermNotesPayable.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

MinorityInterest.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MinorityInterest.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperati.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperati.description: The increase (decrease) in cash associated with the entity's continuing operating, investing, and financing activities. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a debit balance consistent with its label.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.label: Net Increase (Decrease) in Sales and Transfer Prices and Production Costs
NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in sales and transfer prices and in production (lifting) costs related to future production.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInterestA.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Interest Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInterestA.description: "The level of ownership or equity interest acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NotesAndLoansPayable.label: Notes and Loans Payable
NotesAndLoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Notes Receivable, Related Parties, Current
NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

NotesReduction.label: Notes Reduction
NotesReduction.description: The value of notes retired (or transferred to another entity) in noncash investing or financing transactions.

OccupancyRevenue.label: Occupancy Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OccupancyRevenue.description: Revenue derived from the provision of short term lodging; it does not apply to lease or rental income. Includes hotel rooms, cruise revenue, and other revenue related to lodgings.

OilAndGasPropertyFullCostMethodGross.label: Oil and Gas Property, Full Cost Method, Gross
OilAndGasPropertyFullCostMethodGross.description: Oil and gas properties, gross, carried under the full cost method.

OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodA.label: Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method, Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion Amortization and Impairment
OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodA.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and impairment of oil and gas property carried under the successful effort method.

OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodG.label: Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method, Gross
OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodG.description: Oil and Gas properties, gross, carried under the successful effort method.

OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodN.label: Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method, Net
OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodN.description: Oil and gas properties net of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization, impairment, and abandonment, carried under the successful effort method.

OilAndGasSalesRevenue.label: Oil and Gas Sales Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OilAndGasSalesRevenue.description: Revenue from the sale of oil and gas during the period.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Adjustment that results from the process of translating subsidiary financial statements and foreign equity investments into the reporting currency of the reporting entity, net of tax.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLoansPayable.label: Other Loans Payable
OtherLoansPayable.description: Amount of long-term loans payable classified as other.

OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Current
OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherSalesRevenueNet.label: Other Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherSalesRevenueNet.description: Amount, after sales adjustments, returns, allowances, and discounts, of revenue classified as other.

OtherSecuredFinancings.label: Other Secured Financings
OtherSecuredFinancings.description: Secured financing other than securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.label: Other Selling, General and Administrative Expense
OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expense classified as other.

ParticipatingMortgageLoansMortgageObliga.label: Participating Mortgage Loans, Mortgage Obligations, Amount
ParticipatingMortgageLoansMortgageObliga.description: The aggregate amount of the participating mortgage obligation at the end of the accounting period.

PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.label: Payments for Capital Improvements
PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

PaymentsForFees.label: Payments for Other Fees
PaymentsForFees.description: Amount of cash outflow for fees classified as other.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfConvertiblePrefer.label: Payments for Repurchase of Convertible Preferred Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfConvertiblePrefer.description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock originally issued and identified as a security that can be exchanged for another type of financial security. This repurchased stock is held in treasury.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held for investment purposes.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Current
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.label: Proceeds from Debt, Net of Issuance Costs
ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.description: The cash inflow from additional borrowings, net of cash paid to third parties in connection with debt origination.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesAndIn.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses and Interests in Affiliates
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesAndIn.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a business segment or subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled during the period (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Convertible Preferred Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.label: Proceeds from Partnership Contribution
ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.description: The cash inflow from the capital received in cash from a partner in a partnership during the period.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.description: Amount of cash inflow for the sale of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Secured Notes Payable
ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProvedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortM.label: Proved Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method
ProvedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortM.description: Oil and Gas properties with proved reserves under the successful effort method.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

PurchaseObligation.label: Purchase Obligation
PurchaseObligation.description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.label: Real Estate Investment Property, at Cost
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.description: Amount of real estate investment property which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestmentsOther.label: Real Estate Investments, Other
RealEstateInvestmentsOther.description: Amount of real estate owned for income production and capital accretion potential, not otherwise specified in the existing taxonomy. Such real estate excludes that which is occupied or used in the business, for entertainment purposes, or held in inventory for specific purposes.

RealEstateTaxExpense.label: Real Estate Tax Expense
RealEstateTaxExpense.description: A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land).

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestPremium.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Premium
ReceivableWithImputedInterestPremium.description: Disclosure of the unamortized amount of the premium on the note or receivable which is added to the face amount of the receivable or loan. The discount or premium is defined as the difference between the present value and the face amount.

RelatedPartyTransactionRate.label: Related Party Transaction, Rate
RelatedPartyTransactionRate.description: Identify the stated interest rate per the agreement, for example, leasing and debt arrangements between related parties.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedStockExpense.label: Restricted Stock or Unit Expense
RestrictedStockExpense.description: Amount of noncash expense for award of restricted stock or unit under share-based payment arrangement.

ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.label: Results of Operations, Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, and Valuation Provisions
ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.description: Depreciation, depletion and amortization, and valuation provisions (impairments) related to oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.label: Results of Operations, Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.description: Costs related to the impairment of oil and gas properties

ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.label: Results of Operations, Income Tax Expense
ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.description: Income tax expense for oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.label: Results of Operations, Oil and Gas Producing Activities Net Income (Excluding Corporate Overhead and Interest Costs)
ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.description: The results of operations for oil and gas producing activities, excluding corporate overhead and interest costs.

ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.label: Results of Operations, Production or Lifting Costs
ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.description: Production (lifting) costs from oil and gas producing activities, including but not limited to lease operating expense, production and ad valorem taxes, and transportation expense.

ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.label: Results of Operations, Revenue from Oil and Gas Producing Activities
ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.description: Total revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.label: Revisions of Previous Quantity Estimates
RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

SalariesAndWages.label: Salary and Wage, NonOfficer, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
SalariesAndWages.description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer employee. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.label: Sales and Transfers of Oil and Gas Produced, Net of Production Costs
SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales and transfers of oil and gas produced.

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

SecurityDepositLiability.label: Security Deposit Liability
SecurityDepositLiability.description: This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the option's term.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price of options that were either forfeited or expired.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Number of Shares
Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of options vested.

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Other
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of changes from other sources.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease)
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValuePurchaseOfAs.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Purchase of Assets
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValuePurchaseOfAs.description: Value of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockOptionPlanExpense.label: Stock or Unit Option Plan Expense
StockOptionPlanExpense.description: Amount of noncash expense for option under share-based payment arrangement.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

UnprovedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffor.label: Unproved Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method
UnprovedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffor.description: Oil and Gas properties with unproved reserves under the successful effort method.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives and Commodity Contracts
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open derivatives, commodity, or energy contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnEnergyContracts.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Energy Contracts
UnrealizedGainLossOnEnergyContracts.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open agreements to purchase or sell energy at some future point, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

UtilitiesOperatingExpense.label: Utilities Operating Expense
UtilitiesOperatingExpense.description: Amount of operating expense of regulated operation.

VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Measure of Activity, Operating Income or Loss
VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIE.description: The amount of income (loss) from operations derived by the reporting entity during the period from the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Measure of Activity, Revenues
VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIE.description: The amount of income between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

CostDepreciationAmortizationAndDepletion.label: Cost, Depreciation, Amortization and Depletion
CostDepreciationAmortizationAndDepletion.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives, and reduction in quantity of natural resource due to consumption directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateDuringPeriod.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate During Period
DebtInstrumentInterestRateDuringPeriod.description: The average effective interest rate during the reporting period.

DerivativeFixedInterestRate.label: Derivative, Fixed Interest Rate
DerivativeFixedInterestRate.description: Fixed interest rate related to the interest rate derivative.

DerivativeForwardInterestRate.label: Derivative, Forward Interest Rate
DerivativeForwardInterestRate.description: Stated rate on an interest rate forward or futures contract.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Other, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax contingencies.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Other, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax settlements.

IncomeTaxReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxR.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxR.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax expense (benefit).

IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

InventoryBuildingsAndImprovements.label: Inventory, Buildings and Improvements
InventoryBuildingsAndImprovements.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of building structures held as inventory including any additions, improvements, or renovations to those structures.

InvestmentCompanyInvestmentIncomeLossRat.label: Investment Company, Investment Income (Loss) Ratio
InvestmentCompanyInvestmentIncomeLossRat.description: Percentage of investment income (loss) to average net assets.

MortgageLoanRelatedToPropertySales1.label: Mortgage Loan Related to Property Sales
MortgageLoanRelatedToPropertySales1.description: Mortgage loan related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionPayablesA.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Payables Assumed
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionPayablesA.description: "The amount of payables that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

PaymentsForRent.label: Payments for Rent
PaymentsForRent.description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

ProceedsFromFeesReceived.label: Proceeds from Fees Received
ProceedsFromFeesReceived.description: Cash received for fees during the current period. This element excludes cash proceeds from license fees.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

SharesIssued.label: Shares, Issued
SharesIssued.description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

StockOptionExercisePriceIncrease.label: Stock Option, Exercise Price, Increase
StockOptionExercisePriceIncrease.description: Per share increase in exercise price of option. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision and option granted under share-based payment arrangement.

SupplementalDeferredPurchasePrice.label: Supplemental Deferred Purchase Price
SupplementalDeferredPurchasePrice.description: A device of credit enhancement where a part of the purchase price for the receivable/ payable is retained to serve as a cash collateral.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

VariableInterestDifferenceBetweenCarryin.label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Comparison of Carrying Amount of Assets and Liabilities to Maximum Loss Exposure
VariableInterestDifferenceBetweenCarryin.description: Difference between the carrying amount of assets and liabilities in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the variable interest entity (VIE) and the reporting entity's maximum exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the VIE, where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

AreaOfRealEstateProperty.label: Area of Real Estate Property
AreaOfRealEstateProperty.description: Area of a real estate property.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ManagementFeeExpense.label: Management Fee Expense
ManagementFeeExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

PurchaseOptionsLand.label: Purchase Options, Land
PurchaseOptionsLand.description: Carrying amount of an option or options to acquire real property.

VariableInterestEntityInitialConsolidati.label: Variable Interest Entity, Initial Consolidation, Gain (Loss)
VariableInterestEntityInitialConsolidati.description: The gain (loss) recognized on initial consolidation of a variable interest entity (VIE) when the VIE is not a business (as defined).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payment of Financing and Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.description: The total of the cash outflow during the period which has been paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt and the cost incurred directly for the issuance of equity securities.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Proceeds from Stock Options Exercised
ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Amount of cash inflow from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued, Value, Stock Options Exercised, Net of Tax Benefit (Expense)
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options, after deduction of related income tax (expense) benefit.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

CustodyFees.label: Custody Fees
CustodyFees.description: Those fees charged for services related to holding, advising, and managing customer investment assets. These account fees usually charged annually or semi-annually, on a per security basis, for the costs of services.

DebtInstrumentCumulativeSinkingFundPayme.label: Debt Instrument, Cumulative Sinking Fund Payments
DebtInstrumentCumulativeSinkingFundPayme.description: Cumulative amount paid into a fund, which is used to retire the debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.description: Effective interest rate for the funds borrowed under the debt agreement considering interest compounding and original issue discount or premium.

DebtIssuanceCostsIncurredDuringNoncashOr.label: Debt Issuance Costs Incurred During Noncash or Partial Noncash Transaction
DebtIssuanceCostsIncurredDuringNoncashOr.description: The amount of debt issuance costs that were incurred during a noncash or partial noncash transaction.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

EscrowDeposit.label: Escrow Deposit
EscrowDeposit.description: The designation of funds furnished by a borrower to a lender to assure future payments of the borrower's real estate taxes and insurance obligations with respect to a mortgaged property. Escrow deposits may be made for a variety of other purposes such as earnest money and contingent payments. This element excludes replacement reserves which are an escrow separately provided for within the US GAAP taxonomy.

FinancingInterestExpense.label: Financing Interest Expense
FinancingInterestExpense.description: This element represents interest incurred for borrowed money which was used to produce goods or render services.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebtBeforeW.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt, before Write off of Debt Issuance Cost
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebtBeforeW.description: Reflects the difference between the fair value of payments made to legally extinguish a debt and its carrying value at that time. This item excludes the write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance costs.

NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent.label: Notes and Loans Payable, Current
NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of all long-term notes and loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

OtherAdditionalCapital.label: Other Additional Capital
OtherAdditionalCapital.description: Amount of additional paid-in capital (APIC) classified as other.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Other Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) for debt classified as other.

RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueToAffiliatesDef.label: Related Party Tax Expense, Due to Affiliates, Deferred
RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueToAffiliatesDef.description: The amount of any deferred tax-related balances due to affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

RelatedPartyTaxExpenseEffectOfChangeInAl.label: Related Party Tax Expense Effect of Change in Allocation Methodology
RelatedPartyTaxExpenseEffectOfChangeInAl.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in tax expense resulting from change in methodology used to allocate tax expense to members of a group for which a consolidated tax return is filed.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Purchase of Assets
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.label: Unamortized Debt Issuance Expense
UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.description: The remaining balance of debt issuance expenses that were capitalized and are being amortized against income over the lives of the respective bond issues. This does not include the amounts capitalized as part of the cost of the utility plant or asset.

CapitalLeaseObligationsIncurred.label: Lease Obligation Incurred
CapitalLeaseObligationsIncurred.description: Amount of increase in lease obligation from new lease.

ContinuingInvolvementWithTransferredFina.label: Continuing Involvement with Transferred Financial Assets, Principal Amount Outstanding
ContinuingInvolvementWithTransferredFina.description: Principal amount of transferred financial assets in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the assets underlying the transaction. Continuing involvement includes, but is not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in transferred financial assets.

DerivativeVariableInterestRate.label: Derivative, Variable Interest Rate
DerivativeVariableInterestRate.description: Variable interest rate in effect as of the balance sheet date related to the interest rate derivative.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Asset, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to disposition of asset. Includes, but is not limited to, intra-entity transfer of asset other than inventory.

ExtinguishmentOfDebtGainLossIncomeTax.label: Extinguishment of Debt, Gain (Loss), Income Tax
ExtinguishmentOfDebtGainLossIncomeTax.description: Current period income tax expense or benefit pertaining to a gain (loss) on an extinguishment of debt.

GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Other Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherInvestments.description: Amount of gain (loss) included in earnings for investments classified as other.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsOther.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Other, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsOther.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other tax credits.

InterestIncomeRelatedParty.label: Interest Income, Related Party
InterestIncomeRelatedParty.description: Amount of interest income earned from interest-bearing assets owed to the entity by related party.

LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedFromOth.label: Litigation Settlement, Amount Awarded from Other Party
LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedFromOth.description: Amount awarded from other party in judgment or settlement of litigation.

LoansReceivableBasisSpreadOnVariableRate.label: Loans Receivable, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
LoansReceivableBasisSpreadOnVariableRate.description: The percentage points (also referred to as 'margin') added to the reference rate as stated in the loan agreement and used to compute the variable rate on the loans receivable. For instance, the loan agreement might state that the interest rate the borrower is obligated to pay is the London Interbank Offered Rate (LIBOR) plus three quarters (3/4) of a percentage point adjusted quarterly (each three months). LIBOR in this example is the index or reference rate, 3/4 percentage point is the margin, the reference rate plus the margin is the fully indexed rate. This element would be used to report separately the margin.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PreferredStockDividendsShares.label: Preferred Stock Dividends, Shares
PreferredStockDividendsShares.description: Number of shares of preferred stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

ProceedsFromLicenseFeesReceived.label: Proceeds from License Fees Received
ProceedsFromLicenseFeesReceived.description: Cash received from licensees for license fees during the current period.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Notes Payable
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherReceivables.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherReceivables.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of receivables classified as other.

PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipment.label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Vehicles
PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipment.description: Period end book value of vehicles owned by the public utility.

RelatedPartiesAmountInCostOfSales.label: Related Parties Amount in Cost of Sales
RelatedPartiesAmountInCostOfSales.description: Amount included in cost of sales related to transactions with related parties incurred and recorded in the statement of operations for the period.

RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Long-term Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.
